channel.title: Game Save problems
channel.description:
Hi guys I need have a question and I hope someone can answer it for me...
Ive been working on a project for a while now and I want to fix the "save game" problem I have.
The problem is that if I turn off the server or log off the client then the game doesn't save unless I click "Save Game" in the quest tab. So What I wanted to know is if theres anyway to do a mass game save every 10 seconds or something like that, I just want the game to automatically save.
This server is a 317, source is DownScape. HybridPvP v3 Client. Let me know if you need more information. THANKS!
